statbar.bio: Trusted mental health information when you need it most

section.promiseHead: Our content helps you make the best choices for your mental well-being.
section.health_expert: Written by mental health experts and journalists
section.medical_reviewed: Reviewed by physicians and mental health professionals
section.update: Updated to reflect the latest health information
section.reviewHead: Our team of board-certified physicians and other mental health professionals ensures our content is accurate, up-to-date, and inclusive.

footer.about: 'VeryWellMind' Verywell Mind's content is for informational and educational purposes only. Our website is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment.
